topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #01: Filters are tables

topItems.title: CALCULATE in DAX #02: Add single column filter
topItems.excerpt: By default, a column filter in CALCULATE overwrites the existing filter over the same column. value.title: Append vs Merge in Power BI and Power Query
